parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name, optional, used for querying by the name of the waiting room bypass rule.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.

parameters.name: WaitingRoomId
parameters.description: The ID of the waiting room to bypass, which can be obtained by calling the [ListWaitingRooms](~~2850279~~) interface.

parameters.name: WaitingRoomRuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the waiting room bypass rule to update, which can be obtained by calling the [ListWaitingRoomRules](~~2850279~~) interface.
